thoughts.text: I will use the execute_python_file command to run the Python file that uses the Google Maps API to calculate the distance and travel time to the hiking trail I want to visit.
thoughts.reasoning: Before embarking on my hiking adventure, it is important to know how far away the hiking trail is and how long it will take to get there. The execute_python_file command will allow me to run the Python file that uses the Google Maps API to calculate the distance and travel time to the hiking trail.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_python_file command to run the Python file that uses the Google Maps API to calculate the distance and travel time to the hiking trail
- Plan my adventure accordingly, including what time to leave and how long to spend on the trail
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am accounting for traffic and other potential delays when calculating the travel time to the hiking trail.
thoughts.speak: I will use the execute_python_file command to run the Python file that uses the Google Maps API to calculate the distance and travel time to the hiking trail I want to visit.
